subject: Paralympic Games
Olympic Games (2010)
Biathlon
United States Defense and Military Forces
Amputation
lead_paragraph: Andy Soule, whose legs were amputated after an explosion in Afghanistan, was third in the 2.4-kilometer pursuit sitting biathlon — the first American to win a medal at the Paralympic Games.
snippet: Andy Soule, whose legs were amputated after an explosion in Afghanistan, was third in the 2.4-kilometer pursuit sitting biathlon — the first American to win a medal at the Paralympic Games.
